languages.text: "Внутренний мир — лишь отражение того, какой мы видим свою душу. Каждый ваяет его по-своему, и у каждого она особенная".
"An inner world is just a reflection of how we see our soul. Everyone shapes it differently and each one is unique."
languages.original_text: "Внутренний мир — лишь отражение того, какой мы видим свою душу. Каждый ваяет его по-своему, и у каждого она особенная".

traits.locale_text: "The inner world is just a reflection of how we see our soul. Everyone shapes it differently and each one is unique."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The inner world is just a reflection of how we see our soul. Everyone shapes it differently and each one is unique."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "An inner world is just a reflection of how we see our soul. Everyone shapes it differently and each one is unique."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我们的内心世界不过是我们对自己灵魂的映像，每个人都有自己独一无二的想法和独一无二的世界。”
languages.original_text: "An inner world is just a reflection of how we see our soul. Everyone shapes it differently and each one is unique."

traits.locale_text: “我们的内心世界不过是我们对自己灵魂的映像，每个人都有自己独一无二的想法和独一无二的世界。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «El mundo interior no es más que un reflejo de cómo percibimos nuestra alma. Cada uno le da su propia forma, y todos son únicos».
languages.original_text: "An inner world is just a reflection of how we see our soul. Everyone shapes it differently and each one is unique."

traits.locale_text: «El mundo interior no es más que un reflejo de cómo percibimos nuestra alma. Cada uno le da su propia forma, y todos son únicos».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Un monde intérieur reflète simplement la vision que nous avons de notre âme. Son apparence est donc toujours unique, vu qu'elle dépend de la perception de chacun. »
languages.original_text: "An inner world is just a reflection of how we see our soul. Everyone shapes it differently and each one is unique."

traits.locale_text: « Un monde intérieur reflète simplement la vision que nous avons de notre âme. Son apparence est donc toujours unique, vu qu'elle dépend de la perception de chacun. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Eine innere Welt ist nur ein Abbild dessen, wie wir unsere Seele sehen. Jeder formt sie anders, und jede ist einzigartig."
languages.original_text: "An inner world is just a reflection of how we see our soul. Everyone shapes it differently and each one is unique."

traits.locale_text: "Eine innere Welt ist nur ein Abbild dessen, wie wir unsere Seele sehen. Jeder formt sie anders, und jede ist einzigartig."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「内なる世界とは、自分の魂をどう見ているかの反映にすぎない。その形は人それぞれで、それぞれが異なるなのだ」
languages.original_text: "An inner world is just a reflection of how we see our soul. Everyone shapes it differently and each one is unique."

traits.locale_text: 「内なる世界とは、自分の魂をどう見ているかの反映にすぎない。その形は人それぞれで、それぞれが異なるなのだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "İç dünyalar, kendi ruhlarımızı nasıl gördüğümüzün bir yansımasıdır. Herkes dünyasını farklı biçimde şekillendirir ve her biri eşsizdir."
languages.original_text: "An inner world is just a reflection of how we see our soul. Everyone shapes it differently and each one is unique."

traits.locale_text: "İç dünyalar, kendi ruhlarımızı nasıl gördüğümüzün bir yansımasıdır. Herkes dünyasını farklı biçimde şekillendirir ve her biri eşsizdir."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
